record.dc:title: 117MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 37MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 37MG31 - Earth mound. Feature 41A, Level E. Platform on floor of Feature 41. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: This platform is made of hard packed clay burnt to a smooth, dull red on the surface. It is 0.8' high, 5.6' long, 3.8' wide and rests on the floor of Feat. 41. It was thinly covered with Feat. 40 earth. The sides are slightly sloping, making the base of the platform somewhat larger than the top. There is an irregular post mold pattern at the back of the seat but it doesn't seem to have any specific relation to it. In front of the platform is Feat 41D, a partition which is open in the center to allow the person sitting on the seat to look into the larger room.
